item.title: Give Me Your Shell
item.description: Event Challenge Category Points Solves inshack-2019 gimme-your-shell pwn 50 67 TL;DR This is a remote buffer overflow challenge, there is no protection on the binary but ASLR is enable on the remote server. I redirected the execution flow to write my shellcode to a controled area, then jump to it and execute it. Getting informations First I looked at the protections on the binary :
